title: England XVs to take on South Africa: Our writers pick their teams for Saturday's Rugby World Cup final against the Springboks
text:
Sixteen years after Jonny Wilkinson's dramatic drop-goal secured England's first Rugby World Cup triumph, the class of 2019 will emulate that achievement if they beat South Africa on Saturday.

On the back of ending New Zealand's 12-year unbeaten World Cup record, England are firm favourites to lift the Webb Ellis Cup in Yokohama.

South Africa showed in their semi-final win over Wales how effective they can be, though, and the big question is: which combinations does Eddie Jones pick to combat the Springbok threat?

Does he bring back the Farrell-Tuilagi-Slade axis or does he stick with the Ford-Farrell-Tuilagi triumverate?

We have asked our...
description: Sixteen years after Jonny Wilkinson's dramatic drop-goal secured England's first Rugby World Cup triumph, the class of 2019 will emulate that achievement if they beat South Africa on Saturday.
